Description:
Via Medica International Healthcare LLC is looking for Registered Nurses (UAE National/Emirati) for to be part of our team.Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree in Nursing Graduate with at least two years of clinical experience.
DOH License
Can join immediately
UAE NationalResponsibilities:Patient Care:Conduct comprehensive patient assessments.
Develop and implement individualized care plans based on patient needs.
Administer medications and treatments accurately and safely.
Monitor vital signs and assess patient conditions, promptly reporting any changesDocumentation:Maintain accurate and up-to-date patient records.
Document all assessments, interventions, and outcomes in electronic medical records Emergency Response:Respond efficiently and calmly in emergency situations, providing immediate care and initiating appropriate interventions.Quality Improvement:Participate in quality improvement initiatives to enhance patient outcomes and safety.Job Details
